name: Pepo Gourdo and The Moonstone
description:
Story: 

The Little Pumpkin sets out with her friends on an adventurous journey to find the Moon Stone. 

She meets several characters along the way in this quest and learns many things about herself.

Kai is taken from his home by a mysterious group of people who claim they need him to save their world. Kai soon realizes that he is not the only one in danger as the fate of all worlds hangs in the balance.

In a dark Halloween night, the Little Pumpkin travels through a graveyard and is attacked by hyenas.

 'Cause they are predators, not prey, he explains," and they know that hyena is an animal that eats people. That is just the nature of nature. If you are not eating human, there is no reason to attack you.

#################################################

Actual Explanation

#################################################

This Game was created over a weekend for a Game Jam Challenge - where only AI-generated Music and Graphical Assets may be used. 

AI's used where:

  • Midjourney
  • https://melobytes.com/en/app/melobytes-pro
  • https://melobytes.com/en/app/melobytes 
  • https://typatone.com/

The Theme of the Jam was "Spooky Roguelike" - which I could not quite finish. It was fun either - enjoy your playthrough!
